B2 strong, healthy, and good at sports: She looks very athletic.
[ before noun ] relating to athletes or athletics: This college has a long tradition of athletic excellence.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had the lithe, athletic body of a ballet dancer.athletic/sporting prowessHe's very attractive, if you like the blond athletic type.He was a trim athletic figure with a narrow, youthful face.The university is very proud of its athletic facilities.
